rukus.text: 43|46|tatha hamane bheja moosa ko apanee nishaaniyon ke saath firaun aur usake pramukhon kee or. to usane kahaah vaastav mein, main sarvalok ke paalanahaar ka rasool hoon.
43|47|aur jab vah unake paas laaya hamaaree nishaaniyaan, to sahasa ve unakee hansee udaane lage.
43|48|tatha ham unhen ek se badh kar ek nishaanee dikhaate rahe aur hamane pakad liya unhen yaatana mein, taaki ve (thattha) se ruk jaayen.
43|49|aur unhonne kahaah he jaadoogar! praarthana kar hamaare lie apane paalanahaar se, us vachan ke aadhaar par, jo tujhase kiya hai. vaastav mein, ham seedhee raah par aa jaayenge.
43|50|to jaise hee hamane door kee unase yaatana, to ve sahasa vachan todane lage.
43|51|tatha pukaara firaun ne apanee jaati mein. usane kahaah he meree jaati! kya nahin hai mere lie misr ka raajy tatha ye naharen, jo bah rahee hain mere neeche se? to kya tum dekh nahin rahe ho
43|52|main achchha hoon ya vah jo apamaanit (heen) hai aur khulakar bol bhee nahin sakata
43|53|kyon nahin utaare gaye usapar sone ke kangan athava aaye farishte usake saath pankti baandhe hue
43|54|to usane jhaansa de diya apanee jaati ko aur sabane usakee baat maan lee. vaastav mein, ve the hee avagyaakaaree log.
43|55|phir jab unhonne hamen krodhit kar diya, to hamane unase badala le liya aur sabako dubo diya.
43|56|aur bana diya hamane unako gaya-guzara aur ek udaaharan, pashchaat ke logon ke lie.
